pages.title: Banana Plants
pages.text: Banana trees are a unique kind of plant that produce an infertile fruit. This means that despite having those tasty tasty bananas, they cannot be used to plant another tree.$(br)To bring one home, one must harvest the fronds on top and then craft one of any size with a Dirt Bucket to obtain a banana sucker.$(br)Once one is planted it must first be raining for it to grow. Then if it is not planted on sand or gravel, it has to be be bone-mealed.$(br)$(br)By default, banana plants can be found in both jungles and beaches.
